name: Ms. Pac-Man: Quest for the Golden Maze
name_original: Ms. Pac-Man: Quest for the Golden Maze
description:
Ms. Pac-Man: Quest for the Golden Maze is an arcade game developed by Creature Labs. It was originally released in 2001. Infogrames published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Ms. Pac-Man: Quest for the Golden Maze on PC.
